pr_title: [TE] frontend - harleyjj/alert-details - show bounds for minute and d…

timeline.bodyText:
I am hesitate to remove the restriction on "dimensionExploration" which may cause lots of computations.
How about just opening to minute level metrics w/o dimension exploration?
timeline.author: xiaohui-sun

replies.bodyText: Sure, I will make those changes.
replies.author: harleyjj
